name: price manager
short_description:
Why pricing strategies are changing futures for online retailers
 
Thirty years ago, retailers didn’t rely on computer software to help tweak their pricing strategies, show them how to get optimum profit maximization out of key products they were selling, or track customers’ purchases so that retailers could provide optimization of pricing.  Online retailers especially didn’t use pricing strategies, since very few were using the web.  However, today hundreds of retailers both off and online use profit maximization and pricing optimization to ensure their prices may be a few cents cheaper than their competition. Pricing pricing changes frequently – even up to nine times a day!
summary: Price Manager is the most intuitive software
